alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 6:24PM CDT until June 02 at 9:07PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying areas along the river begin to flood. At 31.0 feet, 347th Road or Main Street east of Highway 169 is under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 32.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 7pm 7pm 7pm Marais Des Cygnes River Osawatomie 28.0 24.0 Wed 5pm 26.5 29.1 19.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
